title: Quantum physics
summary: Quantum physics is a fundamental theory in physics that provides a description of the physical properties of nature at the scale of atoms and subatomic particles.

content.text: Quantum physics (also known as quantum mechanics) is a fundamental theory in physics that provides a description of the physical properties of nature at the scale of atoms and subatomic particles. It is the foundation of all quantum physics including quantum chemistry, quantum field theory, quantum technology, and quantum information science.

references.text: Griffiths, David J. (2016). Introduction to Quantum Mechanics. Cambridge University Press.
